Issue.creator: ales
Issue.summary: Support for local collections in collection store
Issue.description: Fabric has a collection store interface that returns collection configuration given a collection name. The collection configuration - among other fields - contains a dissemination policy, that is, a policy to define which orgs have access to this collectionâ€™s private data. In the case of local collections, this policy is different at each peer. In particular, given a peer, the policy requires preimage data to be disseminated to other peers of the same org. This task tracks the work required to dynamically create collection configuration for local collections.
